task.name: agent.tasks.GetTransported
task.description: For the agent, to move toward the given position and notify that it is ready to get transported. This mission is persistent until the unit has been transported by a carrier (via the "Transport" mission). The task is done once the unit has been unloaded from carrier (even if the transportation is not complete, if the carrier get destroyed for instance).

parameter.name: position
parameter.description: The position (meeting point) to reach to get transported.

goal.description: To get transported by carrier from a given position.
